ChatGPT to soon allow erotica: OpenAI to launch new policy; safety stressed
description: OpenAI will allow verified adult users to generate erotica content from December 2025, shifting from previous mental health-focused restrictions. This new policy, "treat adults like adults," aims to offer a more personalized experience with enhanced safety tools and robust age verification. The company emphasizes responsible content handling while protecting minors.

Bears in the house: Polar giants chilling in abandoned Arctic station - see images
description: Remarkable drone footage reveals polar bears seeking refuge in an abandoned Russian research station on Kolyuchin Island. Photographer Vadim Makhorov captured these images, showcasing the bears' adaptability as their natural sea ice hunting grounds shrink. This unusual sight highlights the impact of climate change on Arctic wildlife and their interaction with forgotten human structures.

title: Goldman Sachs to employees: Expect more rounds of job cuts, ‘it’s become clear that…’
description: Goldman Sachs is preparing for another round of job cuts before year-end, aiming to achieve further savings and leverage efficiencies from artificial intelligence. Despite this, the bank anticipates an overall increase in headcount by the end of the year. The new "OneGS 3.0" strategy emphasizes AI's role in enhancing operational efficiency across various functions.

Tellis tale isn't a tell-all: Scholar charged for keeping top secret files - not spying
description: Renowned scholar Ashley Tellis faces charges for unlawfully retaining national defense information and undocumented meetings with Chinese officials. The FBI's investigation, triggered by surveillance, uncovered classified documents at his home. While the think-tank community expresses shock, many argue that meeting foreign officials is part of his role, though document handling is questioned.

description: NDA allies Upendra Kushwaha and Jitan Ram Manjhi are expressing discontent over seat allocations in Bihar, particularly Chirag Paswan's LJP(Ram Vilas) receiving 29 seats. Political analysts suggest this move by the BJP might be a strategy to sideline Nitish Kumar post-election.

Is Virat Kohli leaving RCB and retiring from IPL? 'He will play his last match ... '
description: Virat Kohli's future with Royal Challengers Bengaluru is secure. He has committed to playing for the franchise. Reports of him leaving are incorrect. Kohli has not signed a new commercial deal as he awaits potential changes in franchise ownership. He continues to be a key player for RCB and has promised to play his first and last match for Bengaluru.

description: Pakistan faces its deadliest year in a decade. Violence surges, with security personnel deaths on track to exceed 2024. Khyber Pakhtunkhwa and Balochistan are major battlegrounds. The nation confronts a 'Quad of Terror' including TTP, Baloch insurgents, IS-K, and elements within the Afghan Taliban. Border clashes with Afghanistan intensify.

'Forgive me': Bengal rape victim's father calls Mamata 'mother-like'; seeks justice
description: The father of Durgapur gang rape victim has sought forgiveness from Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee after previously criticizing her remarks on women's safety. He described Banerjee as a "mother-like figure" and pleaded for her help in securing justice for his daughter, urging her to forgive any harsh words spoken earlier.

description: Nitish Kumar's JD(U) has unveiled its first list of 57 candidates for the Bihar assembly elections, fielding 30 new faces alongside 27 incumbents. The party aims to retain power, balancing caste equations with a focus on OBC, SC, and EBC nominees. Notably, no Muslim candidates were included in this initial selection.

Amla benefits: Lowers bad cholesterol and supports better heart health
description: Ancient Indian gooseberry, or Amla, is scientifically proven to boost heart health by significantly improving cholesterol levels. Rich in antioxidants, it prevents LDL oxidation and reduces inflammation, crucial for cardiovascular well-being. Consuming fresh amla or unsweetened juice offers maximum benefits, while sugary preparations should be avoided. Consult a doctor before use.

TCS layoffs: HR chief clarifies; ‘We are not chasing a target’
description: Tata Consultancy Services HR head Sudeep Kunnumal addressed layoff concerns. He clarified that TCS is not targeting job cuts but will evaluate all employees. The company has seen a 1% workforce reduction, with further evaluations planned for those who cannot be redeployed. Kunnumal also mentioned TCS's localized US workforce and adaptability to H-1B visa rule changes.

title: Kelly Stafford’s note to Hailee Steinfeld wins hearts across NFL
description: NFL star Josh Allen praised his wife Hailee Steinfeld. Matthew Stafford's wife Kelly Stafford shared Allen's interview, wishing every player had such support. Her message went viral, celebrating the quiet strength of spouses. This highlights the vital role partners play in the lives of football stars, both on and off the field.

title: Trade Rumor: Red Sox tipped to land $80M Phillies star to boost offense
description: Boston Red Sox are eyeing a reunion with powerful free agent Kyle Schwarber, a former fan favorite. A potential sign-and-trade could send outfielder Jarren Duran and a pitching prospect to Philadelphia. This move would inject much-needed power into Boston's lineup and offer the Phillies financial flexibility and defensive upgrades, creating a win-win scenario for both clubs.

title: What happens when you drink clove water after meal for 30 days
description: Embrace a month of clove water after meals for a natural health boost. This ancient remedy significantly enhances digestion, reduces bloating, and strengthens your immune system. It also aids in regulating blood sugar levels and promotes overall well-being. Discover the potent benefits of this simple, traditional drink for a healthier you.
